vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.42
§ Hatita = "exploring"
head of a family of Levitical porters or gate-keepers who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; porteros; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈底大 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "探索"
跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的利未支派一個領袖,司守門
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈底大 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "探索"
跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的利未支派一个领袖,司守门
